summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Lander Street, from 1st Avenue South to Colorado Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by filing and by planking a roadway sixteen (16) feet in width, with the necessary approaches; by the construction of wooden curbs, gutters, and wood sidewalks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3806, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
